name: Eric de Belen
text: How much is it bothering you? Treatment options range from using talc powder to anti-perspirant s, and botox injections to sympathectomy (where they cut off the nerves which stimulate your sweat glands).

source_obj.text: How much is it bothering you? Treatment options range from using talc powder to anti-perspirant s, and botox injections to sympathectomy (where they cut off the nerves which stimulate your sweat glands).
